title: Ep281 Jail Breaks
description:
This week, the gals bust out some stories of bold breaks for freedom. Topics include how to make a getaway dummy, a drunken serial escapist, and a seductive duo on the lam. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Tres Chic Rosé, save up your hair clippings, and tune in for Jail Breaks.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
